description:
This award is only for the NFT owner of the first collection.

Please provide us following information:
- a name for the name tag
- background-color (blue, green, red, purple, brown, silver)
- penguin color (white, green, pink, grey, black, light blue, blue, red, purple, brown)
- uniform (army grey, basic green, basic khaki)
name: Personalized Penguin Tangle Forces
